items.title: Jai Taxi Service
items.description: Jai Taxi is both a taxi service and a showcase of my web development skills, crafted using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

items.title: Cortez Hub
items.description: An immersive gaming app that keeps users updated on the latest game developments and industry news, enhancing their game knowledge.

items.title: Forest Fire Notebook
items.description: Exploring the Algerian Forest Fires Dataset: Analyzing trends to potentially predict forest fires in Algeria. A step towards developing a crucial early warning system for forest fire prevention and management in the region.
